abstract: Juan Martin del Potro defeats Denis Kudla at Delray Beach Open in his first match since March 2015, following return from fourth wrist operation; says winning his first match out after such long absence from court gives him hope of returning to contender status he once held.

headline.print_headline: Once No. 4, del Potro Starts Over Again at 1,041st
headline.main: Once No. 4, Juan Martín del Potro Starts Over Again at 1,041st

snippet: In his first tennis match in 11 months after a wrist operation, Del Potro, 27, beat Denis Kudla on Tuesday night at the Delray Beach Open.
lead_paragraph: In his first tennis match in 11 months after a wrist operation, Del Potro, 27, beat Denis Kudla on Tuesday night at the Delray Beach Open.
